gameTexts.bitterInfo: Food items with a bitter taste are detected by taste buds present at the back of tongue
gameTexts.saltyInfo: Food items with a salty taste are detected by the taste buds present on the edges of our tongue
gameTexts.sweetInfo: Food items with a sweet taste are detected by the taste buds present on the tip of our tongue
gameTexts.sourInfo: Food items with a sour taste can be detected by taste buds present on either sides of our tongue

steps.text: This restaurant is run by a chef who cannot hear or talk. He provides food to his customers based on the taste they want.
Help the chef provide his customers with the correct food items based on the chosen taste.
This customer wishes to activate the given taste buds.

question.text: Choose the food item that can be detected by the highlighted taste bud.

feedBack.text: Nope! The highlighted taste buds are not sensitive to bitter-tasting food items. Food items with a bitter taste can be detected by the upper region of the tongue.

Oops! The highlighted taste buds are not responsible for the sweet taste of food items. This is detected by taste buds located at the tip of the tongue.
